languages.text: "Я понимаю. Это просто маленькая забава, шерин. Не могу же я просто ответить: "О, вы мне тоже нравитесь, {name}". Эти слова сухи и скучны, как трапеза пустотного караванщика. Они недостойны нас с вами".
"I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю. Это просто маленькая забава, шерин. Не могу же я просто ответить: "О, вы мне тоже нравитесь, {name}". Эти слова сухи и скучны, как трапеза пустотного караванщика. Они недостойны нас с вами".

traits.locale_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a void caravanner's dinner. They are unworthy of us."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Lo entiendo. Solo me estoy divirtiendo un poco. No puedo decir "A mí también me gusta, {name}", sin más. Serían palabras tan áridas y tediosas como la cena de un infante del vacío. Sería algo indigno de nosotr{mf|o|a}s».
languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

traits.locale_text: «Lo entiendo. Solo me estoy divirtiendo un poco. No puedo decir "A mí también me gusta, {name}", sin más. Serían palabras tan áridas y tediosas como la cena en una caravana del vacío. Sería algo indigno de nosotr{mf|o|a}s».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我明白，我只是在开玩笑而已，亲爱的。我总不能说，‘噢，我也喜欢你，{name}’吧？这种话就像船员的晚餐一样枯燥无味，完全配不上我们。”
languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

traits.locale_text: “我明白，我只是在开玩笑而已，亲爱的。我总不能说，‘噢，我也喜欢你，{name}’吧？这种话就像虚空商队的晚餐一样枯燥无味，完全配不上我们。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「そっか。ちょっとふざけただけだよ、シャリーン。ただ簡単に『あたしも好きだよ、{name}』なんて言えないんだ。ヴォイズマンの夕食みたいに気の抜けた味気ない言葉だもん。うちらにふさわしくないでしょ」
languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

traits.locale_text: 「そっか。ちょっとふざけただけだよ、シャリーン。ただ簡単に『あたしも好きだよ、{name}』なんて言えないんだ。ヴォイズマンの夕食みたいに気の抜けた味気ない言葉だもん。うちらにふさわしくないでしょ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je comprends. Je badinais avec vous, voilà tout. Je ne peux pas me contenter de vous déclarer ma flamme en retour, {name}. Un tel discours serait aussi fade et terne que l'ordinaire d'un cosmomarin. Vous et moi méritons mieux que ça. »
languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends, shereen. Je badinais avec vous, voilà tout. Je ne peux pas me contenter de vous déclarer ma flamme en retour, {name}. Un tel discours serait aussi fade et terne que l'ordinaire d'un caravanier spatial. Vous et moi méritons mieux que ça. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe. Ich mache nur ein wenig Spaß, Shereen. Ich kann unmöglich einfach sagen: 'Oh, ich mag Euch auch, {name}.' Worte so trocken und fad wie das Essen eines Raumfahrers. Sie sind unserer unwürdig."
languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe. Ich mache nur ein wenig Spaß, Shereen. Ich kann unmöglich einfach sagen 'Oh, ich mag Euch auch, {name}'. Worte so trocken und fad wie das Essen einer Leerenkarawane. Sie sind unserer unwürdig."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, ." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

languages.text: "Anlıyorum. Birazcık eğleneyim dedim şirinim. Gidip 'Ya, ben de senden hoşlanıyorum {name}.' diyemem ki. Uçsuz eri yemeği kadar kuru ve sıkıcı olur, bize yakışmazdı."
languages.original_text: "I understand. I'm just having a little fun, shereen. I can't possibly just say, 'Oh, I like you too, {name}." Words as dry and dull as a voidsman's dinner. They are unworthy of us."

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum. Sadece birazcık eğleniyordum şirinim. Gidip 'ah, ben de senden hoşlanıyorum {name}' diyemem. Uçsuz erlerinin akşam yemekleri kadar kuru ve sıkıcı sözler. Bize layık değiller."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
